SummaryEnglish: The story is about a young girl named Hiromi Nozawa and her dog, Junkers (pronounced Yoon-kers). Hiromi is having troubles at home mainly because of her parents wanting to separate. As she is fighting the loneliness and sorrow which is tearing her apart.........Junkers trys to comfort her because unlike any other dog....he can talk and grant her 3 wishes.
